amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that communication with a Senator or Member of the House of Representatives regarding a pending legislative matter would not be construed to establish coordination with a candidate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit a communication with a Senator or Member of the House of Representatives regarding a pending legislative matter to be construed as to establish coordination with a candidate.

action.text: Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. McIntosh to the Shays amendment (A002).
On agreeing to the McIntosh amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 218 (Roll No. 368).
